description: Nominated 'Best Solo Video' in the 2009 GayVN Awards, and previously received an AAAA Rating/Review in GayVN Magazine (Jan. 2009 issue). Aaron Armstrong's performance was nominated 'Best Solo Scene' in both the 2009 GayVN Awards and Grabby Awards!  Today T. J. and Trystian are enjoying some hot tub time, but that gets 'em kinda horny so they decide to do a double jack off for us!
title: CitiBoyz 52: 'Getting Off', Scene #05
